sentences.sContent: His first aim is to get the warring parties back to the negotiating table (= discussing something ).
sentences.sCn: 他的首要目标就是把交战各方拉回到谈判桌上。

sentences.sContent: ...The one in the House bill would have to negotiate rates with providers...
...as well as negotiate lower credit card payments...
...the people you work with need to negotiate a "What if"...

words.tran: 可通过谈判解决的；可协商的

trans.tranCn: 洽谈， 协商， 谈判； 顺利通过， 成功越过
trans.tranOther: to discuss something in order to reach an agreement, especially in business or politics
